sourceText: And then there were two green parrots in the mango tree!
text: And then there were two green parrots in the mango tree!

sourceText: And now I am cleaning your toes, and your feet, and your knees…
text: And now I am cleaning your toes, and your feet, and your knees…

sourceText: You are such a beautiful girl!
text: You are such a beautiful girl!
